actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Department of the Interior.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 with regard to appointment of members of the Dayton Aviation Heritage Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 to require the Secretary of the Interior to consider recommendations submitted for members on the Dayton Aviation Heritage Commission before making appointments to such Commission. (Current law requires the Secretary to make appointments from recommendations submitted by specified officials or entities.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 with regard to appointment of members of the Dayton Aviation Heritage Commission, and for other purposes.
